parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>False. The post does not refer to any specific parliamentary candidate by name or implicitly.  While the author is a politician, the post focuses on general reflections on the previous presidential election results and the importance of respecting democratic processes. It does not endorse or criticize any specific candidate for the parliamentary elections.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a public Facebook post, paid for and intended to reach a wide audience. The language used ("Oameni buni," "Lecția rezultatelor...") indicates an address to the general public.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>False. The primary objective of the post is not to influence the vote in the parliamentary elections. The content reflects on the previous presidential election, emphasizing the importance of democratic principles and fair play.  There is no explicit or implicit call to vote for or against any candidate in the upcoming parliamentary elections.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>Partially True. The post presents an opinion piece, reflecting on the previous presidential election results and the need for respect for democratic processes. While it's not strictly journalistic in style, it aims to express an opinion and engage in a public discourse on political matters, rather than directly influencing the vote.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>True. The post expresses a personal opinion on the conduct of the previous presidential election and the importance of democratic principles. This opinion is not directly linked to influencing the outcome of the parliamentary elections.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>550578607779672</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, while authored by a politician, does not constitute electoral propaganda for the parliamentary elections.  The content focuses on general reflections on the previous presidential election, emphasizing democratic principles and fair play.  There is no explicit or implicit endorsement or criticism of any candidate running in the parliamentary elections. The post's objective appears to be to express an opinion on the importance of democratic processes, not to influence the outcome of the upcoming parliamentary elections. While the author is a public figure, the content itself does not meet the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>FALSE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates/>
<responsible-party-or-group>INDEPENDENT</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police/>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
